title: President Obama Is Banning the ‘Don’t Tread on Me’ Flag?
subtitle: Legal analyst Eugene Volokh's article about an EEOC decision pertaining to the Gadsden flag ("Don't Tread On Me") led to rumors the pennant has been banned.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: President Obama is banning the Gadsden Flag ("Don't Tread on Me") because it has been deemed racist.
